  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_107583</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_107583</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Deflection of electron beams</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ablenkung der Elektronenstrahlen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Débattement des faisceaux d'électrons</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Deflexão de feixes de elétron</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Deviazione dei fasci elettronici</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εκτροπή των δεσμών ηλεκτρονίων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Desviación de los haces electrónicos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The figures illustrate the deflection of an electron beam as it passes between the two charged plates (top) and between the two magnets (bottom).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">charged plates</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electron beam deflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electron beams</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Electrons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic field</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Abbildungen veranschaulichen die Ablenkung 
eines Elektronenstrahls, während er zwischen die zwei belasteten 
Platten (Oberseite) und zwischen die zwei Magneten (Unterseite) 
überschreitet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les figures illustrent le débattement d'un 
faisceau d'électrons pendant qu'il passe entre les deux plats 
chargés (dessus) et entre les deux aimants (bas).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As figuras ilustram a deflexão de um feixe de 
elétron enquanto passa entre as duas placas carregadas (alto) e entre
os dois ímãs (fundo).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le figure illustrano la deviazione di un fascio 
elettronico mentre passa fra le due piastre caricate (parte superiore)
e fra i due magneti (parte inferiore).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι αριθμοί επεξηγούν την εκτροπή μιας δέσμης 
ηλεκτρονίων καθώς περνά μεταξύ των δύο χρέωσε τα πιάτα 
(κορυφή) και μεταξύ των δύο μαγνητών (κατώτατο σημείο).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las figuras ilustran la desviación de un haz 
electrónico mientras que pasa entre las dos placas cargadas (tapa) y 
entre los dos imanes (fondo).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">belastete Platten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektronenstrahlablenkung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektronenstrahlen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektronen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetisch fangen Sie auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">plats chargés</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">débattement de faisceau d'électrons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">faisceaux d'électrons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Électrons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">champ magnétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">deflexão de feixe do elétron</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">feixes de elétron</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Elétrons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">campo magnético</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">piastre caricate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">deviazione del fascio elettronico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fasci elettronici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Elettroni</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">campo magnetico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χρεωμένα πιάτα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εκτροπή δεσμών ηλεκτρονίων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">placas cargadas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">desviación del haz electrónico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
